input.description_of_goods: Electronic Components and Accessories, various types and specifications
input.quantity: Mixed quantities as per attached specification
required_documents: Full set of clean on board Bills of Lading
Detailed Packing List showing weights and dimensions
special_instructions: Packing list must show exact quantities and part numbers
Each package to be numbered sequentially
Weight and dimensions must be clearly stated

_test_metadata.test_scenario: Inadequate packing list details violating ISBP standards
_test_metadata.expected_failure: Packing list lacks required detail for proper examination
_test_metadata.business_impact: Document discrepancy may delay payment or cause rejection

critical_failures.details: Packing list lacks specific net weight, uses vague descriptions ('approximately', 'various sizes')
critical_failures.suggested_fix: Provide exact net weight, specific dimensions for each package type

critical_failures.details: Quantity description 'Mixed quantities as per attached specification' is too vague
critical_failures.suggested_fix: Specify exact quantities for each item or reference detailed breakdown
critical_failures.isbp_reference: ISBP general principles - specific information required

warnings.details: Marking description 'As per invoice' may cause confusion during examination
warnings.suggested_fix: Provide specific marking details or clear reference system
